GSD.description:
HID: roccat: Fix use-after-free in roccat_read()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit c61786dc727d1850336d12c85a032c9a36ae396d. For more details please see the references link.
